blogPost.excerpt: The Awesome lists on GitHub are great, but it's hard to know which projects are actively maintained and sift through them all easily. I built this tool to help me visualize and query all of the cool resources people put together.
blogPost.body: The Awesome lists on GitHub are great, but it's hard to know which projects are actively maintained and sift through them all easily. I built this tool to help me visualize and query all of the cool resources people put together.
blogPost.title: Awesome Viewer - Visualize all of Github's awesome lists
blogPost.author: Aryaman Sharda

localize.description: GitHub上的Awesome列表很不错，但很难知道哪些项目是积极维护的，也很难轻松地筛选出所有项目。我建立了这个工具来帮助我可视化和查询所有人们放在一起的酷炫资源。
localize.tagline: 可视化Github的所有精彩列表。

localize.description: GitHub上的Awesome列表很不錯，但很難知道哪些項目是積極維護的，也很難輕鬆地篩選出所有項目。我建立了這個工具來幫助我可視化和查詢所有人們放在一起的酷炫資源。
localize.tagline: 可視化Github的所有精彩列表。

previous.excerpt: Best10 offers unrivalled daily support at your fingertips and in the comfort of your own home. Receive daily checkins with your certified coach, a 100% personalised workout and eating plan, complete with shopping lists and recipes.
previous.title: Best10 - 100% personalised workouts, eating plan & a certified coach.

localize.description: Best10为您提供无与伦比的日常支持，让您在家中就能享受到舒适的生活。每天都会收到您的认证教练的检查，100%个性化的锻炼和饮食计划，以及完整的购物清单和食谱。
localize.tagline: 100%个性化的锻炼，饮食计划和认证教练。

localize.description: Best10爲您提供無與倫比的日常支持，讓您在家中就能享受到舒適的生活。每天都會收到您的認證教練的檢查，100%個性化的鍛鍊和飲食計劃，以及完整的購物清單和食譜。

next.excerpt: What is possible with AR? We don't even know yet. But innovative and creative people are already developing interesting apps and solutions using augmented reality. Check out our AR collection.
next.title: Augmented Reality 2021 - 60+ AR use cases and hundreds of examples

localize.description: AR有什么可能？我们甚至还不知道。但创新和创意的人们已经在使用增强现实开发有趣的应用程序和解决方案。看看我们的AR系列。
localize.tagline: 60多个AR使用案例和数百个例子

localize.description: AR有什麼可能？我們甚至還不知道。但創新和創意的人們已經在使用增強現實開發有趣的應用程序和解決方案。看看我們的AR系列。
localize.tagline: 60多個AR使用案例和數百個例子
